mean_cn: n. 旅社，招待所（尤指青年旅社）；临时收容所
mean_en: a building that provides cheap accommodation and meals to students, workers or travellers; a building, usually run by a charity, where people who have no home can stay for a short time
sentence: It was cheaper to stay at the youth hostel.
word_etyma: host客人 + el表地点 → hostel旅店
